results.title: Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I
results.text_hl: Our findings showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Hyperalgesia @DISEASE_MESH:D006930 @@@mechanical hyperalgesia@@@ induced by @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@CPIP@@@ model in single and repeated treatment schedules, respectively; however @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ did not alter @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ signs during @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@CPIP@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Vieira G, Cavalli J, Gonçalves ECD, Gonçalves TR, Laurindo LR, Cola M, Dutra RC. Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I Front Pharmacol. 2017;8():584. PMID: 28928655
citations.BibTeX: @article{28928655, title={Effects of Simvastatin Beyond Dyslipidemia: Exploring Its Antinociceptive Action in an Animal Model of Complex Regional Pain Syndrome-Type I}, author={Vieira G and Cavalli J and Gonçalves ECD and Gonçalves TR and Laurindo LR and Cola M and Dutra RC}, journal={Front Pharmacol}, volume={8}, pages={584}}

results.title: Modulation of morphine antinociceptive tolerance and physical dependence by co-administration of simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Taken together, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be used as an adjutant therapeutic agent in combination with @CHEMICAL_Morphine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009020 @@@morphine@@@ and or other opioids in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with severe @<m>DISEASE_Chronic_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059350 @@@chronic pain@@@.

citations.NLM: Mansouri MT, Khodayar MJ, Tabatabaee A, Ghorbanzadeh B, Naghizadeh B. Modulation of morphine antinociceptive tolerance and physical dependence by co-administration of simvastatin. Pharmacol Biochem Behav. 2015 Oct;137():38-43. PMID: 26255154
citations.BibTeX: @article{26255154, title={Modulation of morphine antinociceptive tolerance and physical dependence by co-administration of simvastatin.}, author={Mansouri MT and Khodayar MJ and Tabatabaee A and Ghorbanzadeh B and Naghizadeh B}, journal={Pharmacol Biochem Behav}, volume={137}, pages={38-43}}
